problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,BI,CI平分∠ABC,∠ACF,过点I作ID∥BC分别交AC,AB于点E,D．若BD=9cm,CE=4cm,则DE等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BI and CI divide equally ∠ABC, ∠ACF, passing point I to draw ID ∥ BC crossing AC, AB at points E, D respectively. If BD = N_0, CE = N_1, then DE is equal to ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了等腰三角形的性质与判定以及平行线的性质．注意由角平分线与平行线,易得等腰三角形
